subject: Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The university announced that forward-center Greg Lewis of Baltimore, point guard Myles Mack of Paterson, N.J., and shooting guard Mike Taylor of Brooklyn had signed to compete for the Scarlet Knights.
snippet: The university announced that forward-center Greg Lewis of Baltimore, point guard Myles Mack of Paterson, N.J., and shooting guard Mike Taylor of Brooklyn had signed to compete for the Scarlet Knights.
